results.name: then again, maybe you were right.

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Dual core 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: The game uses realtime fractals, so we do recommend high-end GPU
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: The game uses realtime fractals, so we do recommend high-end GPU
